titles.title: By the Blood of the Lamb

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}By the blood of the Lamb And the word of our testimony May we overcome May we overcome{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}May we love not our lives Even to death I am crucified I am crucified with Christ{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I live yet not I but Christ Is living in me The life that I live I live By faith in the Son of God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I live yet not I but Christ Is living in me The life that I live I live By the faith in the Son of God{/lang-eng}
